roleset.name: tell or spread rumors
roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to rumor.01-v. No VN class. FN class unattributed_information. Framed by Katie.

example.name: arg 1
example.text: rumors that Marios Monti could become the next prime minister of Italy.
example.arg: that Mario Monti could become the next prime minister of Italy
